events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving rear-end collision at a traffic light. Initial details were noted.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords such as vehicle and collision described in the report.
An agent specialized in vehicle claims was assigned to manage this case and coordinate with the claimant.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, including next steps and required document list.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and driver’s license for further claim processing.
Customer submitted all required documents promptly including police report, pictures, and insurance card.
Investigation started to verify circumstances of the car accident and extent of damages to the vehicle.
Investigation concluded that the other party was at fault based on the traffic camera footage reviewed.
A settlement offer was prepared taking into account estimated repair costs and customer’s deductible.
Customer expressed satisfaction with proposed settlement amount and the communication throughout the process.
Claim was formally approved based on documentation and investigation results confirming liability.
Payment for vehicle repairs was processed and sent to the customer’s bank account promptly.
The claim was closed following successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
